case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
quoteText: THE SITE, AND ALL MATERIALS, INFORMATION, ADVICE, JOB LISTINGS, CAREER GUIDE, USER CONTENT, PRODUCTS, FEATURES AND SERVICES AVAILABLE ON OR THROUGH THE SITE ARE PROVIDED “AS IS,” WITH NO WARRANTIES WHATSOEVER, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED.

case: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
quoteText:
Indeed may collect certain information about you and any actions taken by you during your visit using automated means, such as cookies and web beacons.

case: You waive your right to a class action.
quoteText: Additionally, as a Job Seeker, your use of job search on the Site is at no charge and you acknowledge that part of the price you are paying to use this Site is your acceptance of these terms of service including this Class Action Waiver.

case: You have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service
quoteText: You waive all claims relating to charges unless claimed within 60 days after the charge (this does not affect your credit card issuer rights).

case: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
quoteText: We may also use your information in order to show you targeted advertisements and other content that has been customized for you on third-party websites.

case: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
quoteText: We use cookies, web beacons, and other similar technologies from third-party partners such as Google and Beeswax for measurement services, better targeting advertisements, and for marketing purposes.

case: You can opt out of targeted advertising
quoteText: To opt out of the collection and use of information for ad targeting, or to exercise any other rights, please feel free to follow the steps detailed in section 10 of our Privacy Policy.

case: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
quoteText:
Do Not Track Requests

We do not respond to the browser “Do Not Track” (DNT) signal if enabled by the user in their web browser.
